Name: Songs for the Four Parts of the Night
Notes: A meditative work. The songs of Owl Woman have a healing effect and are meant to be sung at the bedside of someone who is ill. Composition commissioned by the Scottish Arts Council for 'Soundstrata', Glasgow.
Long Description: Setting of poems written by an American Indian of the Papago tribe, OWL WOMAN (19th century). A meditative work. The songs of Owl Woman have a healing effect and are meant to be sung at the bedside of someone who is ill. Composition commissioned by the Scottish Arts Council for 'Soundstrata', Glasgow.
Short Description: A meditative work setting poems by Owl Woman, a Papago Indian woman from the 19th century, intended for healing.
